thread.section_title: Poseidon Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Poseidon Expeditions | poseidonexpeditions.com
thread.title: Sally

author: Sally
title: Sally
text: Travelled early in the season (late Nov), which meant we couldn't get as far south as we wanted, but the expedition team scrambled a great revised itinerary. The small number of passengers and multiple zodiacs, meant plenty of shore landings, and for some of us, an amazing sea kayaking adventure. The accommodation and food were very good. All together a great small ship experience - friendly passengers and crew made the trip really special.
